text: Mavis Staples (born July 10, 1939) is an American rhythm and blues and gospel singer, actress, and civil rights activist. She has recorded and performed with her family's band The Staple Singers, and also as a solo artist. Staples was added into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1999 and the Blues Hall of Fame in 2017. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * River Front Times: Mavis Staples Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American R&B; musicians Category:American R&B; singers Category:American gospel musicians Category:American civil rights activists Category:African-American singers Category:Musicians from Chicago Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Singers from Chicago
